name: Arkanoid Clone (Nico)
description:
This was the perfect Halloween night: you managed to make your own costume for the first time and got a lot of candy from your neighbours! 

But wait, oh no... the school bullies are here... They take all of your treats away from you and push you to the ground. 

But you have two more cards up your sleeve, your skateboard and your Arkanoid abilities you have been training for years!

This project was done as part of a games design module in university.
